description: Canonical project structure used by humans and agents (tool discovery, templates, and CI).

folders.name: .manifest
folders.description: Project manifests (PDD, Task, Issue, TDD, Docker etc.).

folders.name: .tasks
folders.description: Project tasks (machine‑readable task files). Subfolder `.tasks/pdd/` holds PDD registry.

folders.name: .requirements
folders.description: Requirements, scenarios, architecture and related specs.

folders.name: .tools
folders.description: Tooling and helper scripts for automation (scanners, linters, generators).

folders.name: src
folders.description: Source code (language specific layout lives here).

folders.name: .github
folders.description: CI workflows, ISSUE_TEMPLATE, PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE, community files.

agents.notes: Agents should only run trusted scripts; registry.json is the canonical list of executable helper tools for agents.

notes: Keep sensitive local settings (for example .claude/settings.local.json) out of the repo; use .gitignore for machine-local config. History of generated registries is preserved by git — scanner overwrites .tasks/pdd/@todoregistry.md by default.
